value.stringValue:
Subject : Management Escalation closure, Case {!myVariable_current.CH_CaseNumber__r.CaseNumber}
Greetings,
Please find the closure of the Management Escalation regarding Case {!myVariable_current.CH_CaseNumber__r.CaseNumber} for the Customer {!myVariable_current.CH_AccountName__r.Name}.
Thank you for your contributions to complete this Management Escalation.
Regards, {!myVariable_current.CH_EscalationManagerLevel1__r.FirstName} {!myVariable_current.CH_EscalationManagerLevel1__r.MiddleName} {!myVariable_current.CH_EscalationManagerLevel1__r.LastName} Nokia Escalation Manager

rules.name: myRule_17
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 7) AND ( 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 )
rules.label: CH_GlobalClosureEscalation

Flow.description: ME-CNME - The closure notification is sent to interested people ( ME chatter groups) and to Escalation requester and Escalation partners
Flow.label: Chatter Notification For Manage Escalation
